definitions.title: vb. thrust, clap, give a blow, blast
definitions.body: (NH id.; JAram. [[תְּקַע]] strike, blow horn; Eth. t’aq9: blow trumpet);—

thrust, drive, weapon (acc.) into ([[ב]]) a person Ju Jdg 3:21, Jdg 4:21, 2Sa 18:14, peg into ([[ב]]) sthg. Is 22:23, Is 22:25 (cf. Ju Jdg 4:21); hence pitch a tent (acc.), i.e. drive its pegs: Ge 31:25 a, Je 6:3 ( + [[עַל]] against, in fig.), acc. om. Ge 31:25; thrust, drive, beat (strands of hair together) [[בַּיׇּחֵד]] Ju Jdg 16:4, ins. a;so v:Jdg 16:13 (so LXX; cf. GFM:Comm. and PAOS Oct, 1889, 176 ff.); thrust, drive locusts seaward ([[ה]] loc.), Ex 10:19 (J); cf. [[בְּ]] ´[[ת]]: 1Sa 31:10 of fastening bodies to wall, and similarly 1Ch 10:10 (but rd. in both [[הוֹקִיעוּ]] √ [[יקע]] Lag We Dr and mod.).

give a blast, blow (Germ. ‘ stossen ’), c. [[ב]] of instr. (usu. horn or clarion) Jos 6:4, Jos 6:8, Jos 6:9, Jos 6:13, Jos 6:13, Jos 6:16, Jos 6:20 (JE), Ju Jdg 3:27, Jdg 6:34, Jdg 7:18, Jdg 7:18, Jdg 7:19, Jdg 7:20 + 14 t., + Nu 10:3, Nu 10:4, Nu 10:8, Nu 10:10 (P; v. [[חֲחׂחְרָה]]), also Ez Eze 7:14 (v. [[תָּקוֹעַ]] infr.); ´[[ת]]: alone Ju Jdg 7:20, Nu 10:7 (P; opp. [[חֵרִיעַ]] sound an alarm), c. acc. [[תְּרוּעָה]] v:Nu 10:5, v:Nu 10:6, v:Nu 10:6 (P; v. [[חֲחׂחְרָה]]); c. acc. of instrument Ju Jdg 7:22, Ho 5:8, Is 18:3, Je 4:5, Je 6:1, Je 51:27, Joe 2:1, Joe 2:15, Ps 81:4, + [[תקעו]] Jos 6:9 (Kt ; Qr [[תּׂקְעֵי]]).

str1 Ke, clap hands; in triumph, [[כַּף עָלֶיךָ]] ´[[ת]]: Na 3:19, [[כָָף]] ´[[ת]]: Ps 47:2; also (late) of gesture ratifying a bargain, specif. pledging oneself to become surety, only Pr. (all ‖[[עַרַב ]]): [[לַזׇּר כַּפֶּיךָ]] ´[[ת]]: Pr 17:18; Pr 22:26; abs. Pr 11:15. †
[[יִתָּקַע שׁוֹפָר]] Am 3:6 if a horn be blown, cf. ´[[בְּשׁ]] :´[[יִתּ]]: Is 27:13 it shall be blown (a blast shall be given) on a horn.
[[מִי־הוּא]] :[[לְיׇדִי יִתָּקֵֽעַ]] Job 17:3 who is there that will strike himself (i.e. pledge himself) into my hand ?
